懐が淋しい: (ふところがさびしい) - strapped for cash; hard up

懐が痛む: (ふところがいたむ) - to make a dent in one's purse; to have to pay out of one's own pocket.
懐く: (うだく) - to embrace/to hold in the arms (e.g. a baby)/to hug; (いだく only) to harbour (e.g. grudge) (harbor)/to bear (e.g. a grudge)/to entertain (e.g. suspicion); (だく only) to have sex with/to make love to/to sleep with; (だく only) to sit on eggs
懐ける: (なつける) - to win over; to win another's heart
懐しい: (ゆかしい) - admirable/charming/refined; nostalgic; curious/eager to know (or see, experience, etc.)

懐に入る: (ふところにはいる) - to get in someone's pocket/to help oneself to someone's wallet; to curry favour (favor)/to butter up/to make up to/to gain someone's trust; {MA;sumo} to get in close to one's opponent
懐を痛める: (ふところをいためる) - to pay out of one's own pocket
懐を肥やす: (ふところをこやす) - to feather one's own nest

懐工合: (ふところぐあい) - one's financial standing

懐炉灰: (かいろばい) - fuel source for a (pocket) body warmer

懲り懲り: (こりごり) - bitter experience; learning from a bad experience; having had enough (of something unpleasant); having had a bellyful; being sick and tired (of something); being fed up

懲役刑: (ちょうえきけい) - jail sentence; imprisonment
懲悪: (ちょうあく) - chastisement for evildoing; punishment

懲戒処分: (ちょうかいしょぶん) - disciplinary measures; (judicial) sanctions
懲戒請求: (ちょうかいせいきゅう) - formal demand for disciplinary measures against a lawyer
懲罰委員会: (ちょうばついいんかい) - disciplinary committee

懶ける: (なまける) - to be idle/to slacken; to neglect (e.g. one's work)

懸かり: (かかり) - starting/engaging; (esp. 掛かり, 掛り) expenses/costs; (esp. 掛かり, 掛り; often as カカリ)  attack (esp. a corner approach in the game of go); barb; (掛かり, 掛り only) (esp. for government offices, railways, etc.)  charge/duty/person in charge/official/clerk
懸かる: (かかる) - to take (a resource, e.g. time or money); to hang; to come into view/to arrive; to come under (a contract, a tax); to start (engines, motors); to attend/to deal with/to handle; to have started to/to be on the verge of; to overlap (e.g. information in a manual)/to cover; to (come) at; to be fastened; to be covered (e.g. with dust, a table-cloth, etc.); to be caught in; to get a call; to depend on
懸け: (がけ) - (after an article of clothing) -clad; (after a -masu stem) in the midst of; (after a number in the ichi, ni counting system) tenths (e.g. wholesale price, as tenths of retail price); (after a number in the hitotsu, futatsu counting system) times (i.e. multiplied by); (after a number of people) able-to-seat (of a chair, etc.)
懸ける: (かける) - to hang (e.g. picture)/to hoist (e.g. sail)/to raise (e.g. flag); to sit; to take (time, money)/to expend (money, time, etc.); to make (a call); to multiply; to secure (e.g. lock); to put on (glasses, etc.); to cover; to burden someone; to apply (insurance); to turn on (an engine, etc.)/to set (a dial, an alarm clock, etc.); to put an effect (spell, anaesthetic, etc.) on; to hold an emotion for (pity, hope, etc.); (also 繋ける) to bind; to pour (or sprinkle, spray, etc.) onto; to argue (in court)/to deliberate (in a meeting)/to present (e.g. idea to a conference, etc.); to increase further; to catch (in a trap, etc.); to set atop; to erect (a makeshift building); to hold (a play, festival, etc.); to wager/to bet/to risk/to stake/to gamble; (after -masu stem of verb)  to be partway doing .../to begin (but not complete) .../to be about to ...; (after -masu stem of verb)  indicates (verb) is being directed to (someone)
懸け橋: (かけはし) - suspension bridge/viaduct/temporary bridge; mediation/go-between
